code: var protocol=window.location.protocol;var hostname=window.location.hostname;var port=window.location.port;var a,s;switch(hostname){case'localhost':case'127.0.0.1':a='http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/';s='http://127.0.0.1:8000/';break;case'http://www.stem-robotics.mx':a='http://www.stem-robotics.mx/api_charlie_brown/public/api/';s='http://www.stem-robotics.mx/api_charlie_brown/public/api/';break;default:a=protocol+'//api'+hostname+'/public/api/';s=protocol+'//api'+hostname+'/public/';}var api=a;var src=s;var basename=hostname==='localhost'?Number(port)===3000||Number(port)===3001||Number(port)===3002||Number(port)===3003?'':'/reactjs/build/':'/';export var CONFIG={prefix:'reactjs',api:api,src:src,basename:basename,debug:true};
